programme.title: 1989 local elections and the defeat of propostions S and P
programme.short_synopsis: The defeat of the Domestic Partnership Bill and proposition to retire Candlestick Park.
programme.medium_synopsis: The 1989 state and local elections, the defeat of Proposition S denying homosexuals to be recognised as domestic partners, and the vote against the abandonment of Candlestick Park.
